BR_text.BRsummary: Fix activation function for pooled ELECTRA output
BR_text.BRdescription:
Hi,
 inspired by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/huggingface/transformers/pull/4257>huggingface/transformers#4257</denchmark-link>
  I just had a look at the original ELECTRA implementation, and it seems that they're using  instead of  for getting a pooled output:
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/google-research/electra/blob/79111328070e491b287c307906701ebc61091eb2/model/modeling.py#L247>https://github.com/google-research/electra/blob/79111328070e491b287c307906701ebc61091eb2/model/modeling.py#L247</denchmark-link>
 
 and:
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/google-research/electra/blob/79111328070e491b287c307906701ebc61091eb2/model/modeling.py#L45>https://github.com/google-research/electra/blob/79111328070e491b287c307906701ebc61091eb2/model/modeling.py#L45</denchmark-link>
 
 Unfortunately, I used tanh in the ELECTRA model integration:
 
 
 
 FARM/farm/modeling/language_model.py
 
 
          Line 1240
       in
       37591d1
 
 
 
 
 
 
  config.summary_activation = 'tanh' 
 
 
 
 
 
 I will open a PR to fix that :)
